name: pm5.74d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)), wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)), wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)), wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))

body.origin: |- wb(wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)), wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))

comment: Distribution of implication over biconditional (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Mar-1996.)
